Html:
Is there a way to adjust the scaling % when you go to print preview? I Have tried:

      $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getPageSetup()->setFitToWidth('1');

This is great if ONLY your worksheet is 1 page. When you have a worksheet with 150 pages it smashes everything on to one page and looks horrible.

Is there a way to adjust the scaling % from 100% to 75% etc...?

 

Thanks!
